divs: sighting detailsit was afternoon about the end of the pool being opned for the seadson. some one at the pool said what is that and everyone was looking up. about 7 (seven) people were there incluiding myself. i was reading under a tree and almost did not look to see what was there. i finally got up and looked at about a 50 degree deflection and the "object" was sitting there in the sky. it did not appear to have any known characteristics of conventional aircraft and seemed "stationary". this was after 5 minutes of others looking at this. another few minutes went by and the other indiviuals were looking up watching it. i looked at it shortly for a minute or two, but still remember it. then i went and sat down under the tree and continued to read. then they claimed it disapeared and i got up again and looked for longer than when i first saw it. i did not see it in the area. so i paid no further attention to it. i did not have a camera or other recording devices. it was a clear day and not too bright. and the sun was behind me and\or not in my eyes. i have since moved to a new apt. in the same complex but phone remains the same. i thought at first is was something but not able to describe in my mind. i did not ask the other people at my location if they knew or asked them what they thought of it. my health was ok or stable and i had bee out of back surgery for at least a year and i was then currently taking medications for chronic back pain. i had been taking meds for at least 3 years up to the event. if there are any questions to whomever may see this.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There was one other sighting in Reno on or around August 20th 2003
